Women would have more empathy towards each other and be able to resolve conflicts in a peaceful manner.
The world would be less violent as women tend to avoid conflict and promote peace.
Women would prioritize education for girls and invest in healthcare systems, leading to improved global health outcomes.
Women would prioritize environmental sustainability and work towards reducing carbon emissions, leading to a healthier planet.
Women would be better equipped to handle economic crises and ensure equal opportunities for all citizens.
